short_summary: Tender opportunity for SRV-SO, Identification and characterization of water and bottom sediments.
description: The Impact Assessment Act (IA 2019) provides a framework for the application of the federal environmental effects assessment. It is a self-assessment process whereby federal authorities consider the environmental impacts of projects before making any irrevocable decisions for which they have an assignment or jurisdiction that gives them decision-making authority. Fortunately, the last environmental assessment process was conducted under the former Canadian Environmental Assessment Act.
